name: Kirtiraj-lekhraj-singh
body:
Story
Tagline
Life House-(Wishes & Limitations)
Introduction

My Life House-(Wishes & Limitations)

"Time is the Father of All Deeds,
Deed is the Mother of All Necessities,
Necessity is the Mother of All Discoveries,
Discovery is the Mother of All Inventions,
Invent is the Mother of All Chaos es,
Chaos is the Mother of All Destruction,
Destroy is the Mother of All Acquaintances,
So, Acquaintance is a Apprentice to Father Time"
                                                             _ Kirtiraj Lekhraj Singh

Mom Says:I was the Biggest Thing on the earth in Human Species  in Real.
She Say's I was born Bigger that Normal Delivery Child and Healthy. It is True or Lies I Don;nt Know Till Now. I Wish TO Say.That why Write It  Here.

"Ram" is the Name Which Called it from Pure Heart. I Will Fallen For All Wishes With That Old Fashion Tune Which All Like it in Their Own Way Example: Inspiring Tune of Living Tune Lionel Richie-"Angel"And Sound with that above name.

 "August's Rhapsody" By August Rush,Gods Speaks Through Music
 All You Listen Round U

Terminator 2:Judgment Day Soundtrack always liven in my Dream.
With All that burning thing  Reaches to Burning  Metal Skull
Like it was my Past,Future and Present Seen in those burning 
Metal Diffusing Red Eye.Its like Honor to Die with them(Do or Die) 

I m a Sensitive person if some one try me
Not so speak directly but indirectly i say so much that they have to understand me is as that simple like SIGN.. Maybe Late, I will GET IT.
Always people says before speak think Ten Times.And I Say I Had No Ten Head to think like you..But I Use Ten Percent As Best As I Can!

No friends from Childhood At All, Leave One.But Not Much Talk Able. So U can know that 
I m Alone Living Personality.. So, My Requesting Factors For All is that NO ONE SHOULD LEFT ALONE.

Singing & Danceing little bit make Self Happy Only if it from your Heart (Ment to It/Justice to It).. 
Listen all kind of songs & movies.
I Love Express love song that Sing with an Heart.
I Love that Music Which Made Your Heart Believe.
Because, I am a Animator - I am Kind of Dreamer 
Apologies, To Those Who Doesn't Understand Me
For Them I Love Being Simple Person Guy.. 

Truth Above me: Once Childhood I was Married (Indirectly) 
to a Plant "Tulsi" Called Ocimum tenuiflorum Plant.
 Marring Once I didn't want to wish to Marry Again 
as I never want to Marry Again:
As Someone Say:Once We Lived,Once We Die,
Once We Do Matrimony, And Once We Fallen In Love Forever,
Like A Human Universal Truth.

Requesting Factors I Would Like to Die With this Song 
Because, This Song The My Intuition,
Jurassic Park Theme Song - Most Popular Version
Its A Felt With Roar of Last Extinct Species,It would be Like My Extinction Too...

I loves 
Snow-Boarding, 
Snow-Sliding, 
Snow-Skating, 
Water-Sliding, 
Roller-Costar, 
Sky-Diving, 
Base-Ball,
Rugby-Football, 
Soccer, 
Archery, 
Lacrosse Stick, 
Pool Tables, 
Pin Pong, 
Rodeo Mechanical Rides,
Croquet Game(Hammer Golf), 
Slip N Slide (Tapis De Glisse), 
Water Surfing, 
Boat Surfing, 
Sky Surfing,
Kite Gliding, 
Para Sailing, 
Para Gliding, 
Wind-Surfing, 
Water-Skiing, 
Snow-Skiing, 
Water Jet-Skiing,
Snow Jet-Skiing, 
Water Kite-Surfing, 
Snow Kite-Surfing
All kind of Gaming stuff even in that i 'm not capable of doing it.
ITS JUST A WISHES THAT'S ALL..........
LIFE LOCK BUT JOURNEY IS ON!

"I'M SELFISH,IMPATIENT
AND A LITTLE INSECURE, I MAKE
MISTAKES, I AM OUT OF 
CONTROL AND AT A TIME HARD
TO HANDLE, BUT IF YOU 
CAN'T HANDLE ME AT MY
WORST, THEN YOU SURE AS
HELL DON'T DESERVE ME
AT MY BEST."
                                _TEENAGE MYTH Smiley (Disney Hop Cyrus)
 Phrase

"Something Are Meant to Be Get Old,
Anything Are Sent to Me Get Bold,
But, Envy Are Blend to We Get Both"
                                              _Kirtiraj Lekhraj Singh

Bragging rights
Experience all Kind of Happiness ,Narrowness & Saw-row ness
